item.title: Post One
item.description: The story of my semester This is where Iâ€™m going to show working python code and going between R and python code. x = [0,1,3,5,6,10,4,6,3,7,8,3,2,6,0] y = [2,3,6,3,6,8,4,2,1,4,9,2,3,6,1] yplus1=[] #create empty list for i in range(len(y)): yplus1.append(y[i]+1) print(yplus1) ## [3, 4, 7, 4, 7, 9, 5, 3, 2, 5, 10, 3, 4, 7, 2] library(reticulate) library(ggplot2) ggplot() + geom_point(aes(py$x, py$yplus1)) import re string = "Test this ability to import packages" re.
